contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 24, 1980 D Chorley Arts Entertainment Contest
Chorley Arts Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest with Deportment Mark
chorley-arts-entertainment-contest
None
Chorley Town Hall, Chorley, Lancashire, England, UK Hesketh Bank awarded 1st prize owing to higher music mark. Prizes - 1st £60 and rose bowl, 2nd £35 and trophy, 3rd £25 and trophy. 6th annual contest. 10 bands competed.
Dec. 2, 2014, 9:42 a.m. Dec. 25, 2014, 1:49 p.m.
1 Hesketh Bank Band Harry Bentham
2 Longridge Band P. Gibbins
3 Morecambe Brass Band J. F. Fleming
Unknown Result Bedford (Leigh) Band Alan Hobson
Unknown Result Chorley Silver Band Kenneth Rollins
Unknown Result Coppull Subscription Band Eric Doran
Unknown Result Eccleston Brass Stuart Allison
Unknown Result Hindley Trevor Halliwell
Unknown Result Rivington and Adlington Band Valerie E. Roocroft
Unknown Result Standish Band Colin Moore
